creditline: Gift of SMM (Science Museum of Minnesota)
description: grey with white pedestal base; head tilted slightly to PR; long hair parted at center and gathered and fastened at nape of neck; surface rough at back of ears, PR cheek, bottom sides of neck, and underside
dimension:
14 1/2 x 7 x 7 1/2 in. (36.8 x 17.8 x 19 cm) (with base)
10 1/2 x 7 x 7 1/2 in. (26.7 x 17.8 x 19.1 cm) (without base)
marks: \'5-120\', in black paint on hair fastener
title: Head of a Boy
